meanings.definition: A small bird of the genus Orthotomus, known for its ability to sew leaves together to make its nest.
meanings.sent1: The tailorbirds carefully stitched the leaves to build their cozy nest.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of tailorbirds weaving leaves to create their nest in the tree.
meanings.sent3: The tailorbirds decided to start a leaf-sewing business, offering custom-made nests.
meanings.sent4: Watching the tailorbirds sew leaves together made me appreciate their craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The tailorbirds' leaf-sewing skills are truly remarkable, turning simple materials into intricate homes.
